entry.title: Monday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain showers or flurries this morning then to flurries this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023
